version:1.1-1 fix some incompatible. note: Only test on ip5, Not sure compatible with all other tweaks. If you didn't know how go safe mode, Careful. 解决部分兼容 有限测试，小白就不要装了。 version:1.0-9

2. fix some bugs
3. Extra Back

version:1.0-7
fix conflict with clipshot.
version 1.0-6
1. add two option:
a. Disable on Screenshot.
b. Correct on "Invert Color" mod.
2.add an option to show network bandwidth.
3.and fix some bugs.

version: 1.0-5
Add a slide to set the corner radius.

Add a option to switch, without respiring.

bug fix:
The version1.0-1 only support iphone5 ios7.
In this version i think it support all device.such as ip4,4s,5,5s,and iPad.
